entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
